default.title: Client Management
default.content: Add and manage client information including contact details, case history, and relationship data. Use the client search to find existing clients or create new ones with comprehensive contact information.
quickTips: Keep client information up to date

contact-management.title: Contact Management
contact-management.content: Manage multiple contacts for each client including decision makers, assistants, and other stakeholders. Set primary contacts and communication preferences.

relationship-mapping.title: Relationship Mapping
relationship-mapping.content: Create connections between related clients, such as parent companies, subsidiaries, or family members. This helps track conflicts and shared interests.
